lead_paragraph: MAYERSON--Philip, died peacefully on April 13, 2016, one month shy of his 98th birthday. Mr. Mayerson was a longtime Professor of Classics and Chair of the Classics Department at New York University and Dean of the College of Arts and Sciences. He published two books and many other scholarly articles. He is survived by his two daughters, Miriam and Clare Mayerson, his companion Marjorie Zeidman, and four grandchildren. He always enjoyed a good pipe. 1/3
